CustomField.description: Part of Tech feedback request, this field will be added to the Compact layout, which in turn will be displayed on the Work Oder overview screen so that Tech's know whether or not a Signature is required.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( TEXT(Line_of_Business__c) = "Pest Control", TEXT(Type__c) ="Delivery", Account.VMI__c = true, INCLUDES(Account.Site_Survey__r.Signature_Required_For__c, "Hygiene") && TEXT(Line_of_Business__c) = "Hygiene", INCLUDES(Account.Site_Survey__r.Signature_Required_For__c, "Life Safety") && TEXT(Line_of_Business__c) = "Hygiene", INCLUDES(Account.Site_Survey__r.Signature_Required_For__c, "Chemical") && TEXT(Line_of_Business__c) = "Chemical" ), WorkOrderNumber &" - "& $Label.Signature_Required_YES, WorkOrderNumber &" - "& $Label.Signature_Required_NO)
CustomField.label: Signature Required
